q: The tragedy of life doesn't lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goals to reach.
h:
“The tragedy of life doesn't lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goals to reach.” —
Benjamin Mays

q: You play the hand you're dealt. I think the game's worthwhile.
h:
“You play the hand you're dealt. I think the game's worthwhile. ” —
Christopher Reeve

q: Mastering others is strength, mastering yourself is true power.
h:
“Mastering others is strength, mastering yourself is true power.” —
Lao Tzu

q: I enjoy life when things are happening. I don't care if it's good things or bad things. That means you're alive.
h:
“I enjoy life when things are happening. I don't care if it's good things or bad things. That means you're alive.” —
Joan Rivers

q: To a mind that is still, the entire universe surrenders.
h:
“To a mind that is still, the entire universe surrenders.” —
Zhuangzi
